snippet.title: Curse of the Azure Bonds gameplay (PC Game, 1989)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Curse of the Azure Bonds, Dos PC game produced by SSI in 1989 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/curse-of-the-azure-bonds/3957/
In this video I am creating a party and roaming around in the starting zone, confused and having no items/gold. Having a great story and plot, I highly recommend this game if you are an RPG lover.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Drakkhen - https://youtu.be/4pONy1PjoqM
Castle Master 2: The Crypt - https://youtu.be/NrRRucUrcv4
Castle Master - https://youtu.be/RSEHjw_Hb0U
